Articles.Content: Hello guys I'm currently working on an indie game for Mac (Anything about that I would prefer be considered off-topic) and I'm here seeing if anyone has an idea for the name of my company because i'm not creative. I'm in Canada and plan on making video games so something with that in mind preferably but anything goes. Please submit any/all ideas.

Hello guys I'm currently working on an indie game for Mac (Anything about that I would prefer be considered off-topic) and I'm here seeing if anyone has an idea for the name of my company because i'm not creative. I'm in Canada and plan on making video games so something with that in mind preferably but anything goes. Please submit any/all ideas.

G-eh-mes

Get it, cuz you guys say "eh" a lot.

Hello guys I'm currently working on an indie game ... i'm not creative.

Perhaps your company name is the least of your problems?

I wouldn't create a name based on your geographic location - as you may end up distributing over the net and the net has no borders.

@tgofox I already have a game idea just can't think of a name that i can't search and find already.I'm working on it I just wanted to see if anyone had any ideas for a name.

@Anicient: Thats funny
The name is the least important part probably, just have a placeholder name for now. "Gamecompany XYZ" or something
Electronic Arts. Because EA changed their name to Evil A-holes. Maybe you can actually make art.
